positive.name: Airtight caves
positive.text: The planet has cave systems that allow air insulation that is beneficial for underground colony development.

positive.name: Edible Flora
positive.text: The probe analyses that the planet's present flora can provide nutrients for colonists' survival.

positive.name: Useful Fauna
positive.text: It is observed that the animal life on this planet can be domesticated or provide symbiotic relationship with human.

positive.name: High-tech Alien ruins
positive.text: The probe found out several alien ruins that scattered around the planet contain bizarre alien technologies.

positive.name: Beautiful Landscape
positive.text: The probe sent back many image data of landscape that is evaluated that beautiful based on human standard.

positive.name: Beneficial Surface for Construction
positive.text: The planet's surface is proved to be beneficial for base construction.

neutral.name: Neutral Flora
neutral.text: The planet's present flora is neither good or bad for colony's survival.

neutral.name: Fauna present
neutral.text: The animal life found on this planet is neutral and provide no benefit for colony.

negative.name: Unstable Surface
negative.text: The planet geological is unstable and hard for spaceship to land.

negative.name: Dangerous Flora
negative.text: The planet's flora is highly toxic and can be aggressively parasitic to other lifeforms.

negative.name: Dangerous Fauna
negative.text: There are animals which pose huge threats to colonists survival.

negative.name: Irregular extreme weathers
negative.text: The planet has climate anomalies that can cause weather with extreme heat, cold or even acid, toxic, irradiated rain.

negative.name: Dangerous Alien ruins
negative.text: he probe found out several alien ruins that scattered around the planet contain major threats upon discovering.
